text: وَكَذَٰلِكَ حَقَّتْ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ

translation.en.sahih: And thus has the word of your Lord come into effect upon those who disbelieved that they are companions of the Fire.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan demikianlah telah pasti berlaku ketetapan azab Tuhanmu terhadap orang-orang kafir, karena sesungguhnya mereka adalah penghuni neraka.
